summary: This Mod adds a new Spell \"mass lightning\". Its a variant of the original sparks-Spell!
descriptionHtml:
[font=Palatino Linotype][b][color=Orange][size=+5]JoO\'s Mass Lightning (by JackoO)[/size][/color][/b][/font]


current version 1.0
[b][color=red]Please read this before download![/color][/b]

[font=Palatino Linotype][b][color=orange][size=+3]Description:[/size][/color][/b][/font]
---------------------------------------------------------
You wanna play like a real badass sith? This Spellbook teaches you the new spell Mass Lightning. It can be found in the archmages quarters. (on a new table)
The spellbook gives you a new spell (no replacer!). 

Combine it with both of your hands and see what you get ;) 


So this mod is mainly just for fun. (not really balanced)

[font=Palatino Linotype][b][color=Yellow][size=+1]Please take pictures of your usage of the spell and upload here![/size][/color][/b][/font]


[font=Palatino Linotype][b][color=orange][size=+3]Background:[/size][/color][/b][/font]
---------------------------------------------------------
Check out my skyrim other Skyrim mods:

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9205]JoO\'s Imperial Praetorian Armor[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3733]JoO\'s Jedi Robe[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11385]JoO\'s Jedi Robe V2[/url]

You play Fallout New Vegas? Check out my FNV Mod:

[url=http://newvegas.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=45203]JoO\'s Modern Armory[/url]


[font=Palatino Linotype][b][color=orange][size=+3]Content:[/size][/color][/b][/font]
---------------------------------------------------------
this mod includes:
- New Spell (Mass Lightning)

[font=Palatino Linotype][b][color=orange][size=+3]Installation:[/size][/color][/b][/font]
---------------------------------------------------------
Copy files to \"yourSkyrimfolder\"\\\\
Start Skyrim Launcher,check the JoOMassLightning.esp and startgame


[font=Palatino Linotype][b][color=orange][size=+3]Uninstall:[/size][/color][/b][/font]
---------------------------------------------------------
uncheck JoOJediRobeV2.esp in Skyrim Launcher
delete the .esp file and the .bsa
